definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
to be convinced/to be sure/to firmly believe/to be positive that/definite news

sentences.english: I would like to receive from you a detailed report on current market conditions every month .
sentences.chinese: 我想每月收到你方一份具體確當前市場行情報告。

sentences.english: Nor is there anything new in wearing leather itself.
sentences.chinese: 但皮革本身確沒什麼新穿法。

sentences.english: The first six months after my diagnosis my life just stopped.
sentences.chinese: 確斷後的前六個月我的生命好像停止了。

sentences.english: That emergency was now on them and the generalissimo , himself, flew to Manchuria.
sentences.chinese: 現在局勢確很危急，蔣介石親自飛來滿洲督戰。

sentences.english: A disease&n bsp;known is half cured.
sentences.chinese: 病情確診斷，治病好一半。

sentences.english: Dan and his family will move to Florida when his job confirmation comes through.
sentences.chinese: 唐工作得到確定時丹和他的家人將搬到佛羅里達。

sentences.english: But instead, Cupid fell deeply in love with her.
sentences.chinese: 但是，丘比特確深深愛上了普賽克，並娶她爲妻。

sentences.english: Although she is a successful career woman, she never puts on airs.
sentences.chinese: 雖然她是個事有成的職業婦女，確從不擺架子。

sentences.english: All the prices in the lists get subject to our finis confirmine.
sentences.chinese: 單上所有價值以我方末端確覺得準。

sentences.english: Where it is impossible to ascertain the transaction value, the dutiable price shall be assessed by the Customs in accordance with law.
sentences.chinese: 成交價格不能確定時，完稅價格由海關依法估定。

sentences.english: He died, still unmurdered, in January 1924.
sentences.chinese: 列寧於1924年1月去世，確爲謀殺。

sentences.english: He did misappropriate the public funds, but there were extenuating circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 確挪用了公款，但有可以減輕罪責的情況。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
